workflow.name: Protect Telegram groups with math CAPTCHA verification and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## Why this template rocks

**üöÄ Lightning-fast setup** - Deploy in under 5 minutes  
**üí° Zero AI costs** - Uses simple math instead of expensive LLM calls  
**üõ°Ô∏è 99% spam blocking** - Mathematical CAPTCHAs stop bots instantly  
**‚ö° Ultra-efficient** - Runs on minimal resources, scales to thousands of users  
**üéØ Plug-and-play** - Just add your bot token and Google Sheet ID  

## Who's it for

Smart community managers who want **maximum protection with minimum complexity**. Perfect for:
- üéÆ Gaming communities (Discord alternatives)
- üíº Professional Telegram groups  
- üìö Educational channels with 100+ members
- üåê Any public group facing spam bot invasions
- üí∞ Communities wanting to save on AI API costs

## What it does

**This isn't another complicated AI bot** - it's a **lean, mean spam-fighting machine** that works smarter, not harder.

üß† **Simple brilliance**: Instead of expensive AI that can be fooled, we use basic math (1+1=?) that bots consistently fail  
üéØ **Instant results**: New member joins ‚Üí Gets math question ‚Üí Answers correctly = Welcome! / Wrong answer = Banned  
üßπ **Auto-cleanup**: All verification messages disappear automatically - your chat stays pristine  
üìä **Smart tracking**: Google Sheets integration tracks everything without bloating your database

**The genius is in the simplicity** - real humans solve "7+3=?" in 2 seconds, bots struggle or ignore it completely.

## How it works (the magic behind the simplicity)

**Step 1**: üëÅÔ∏è Bot detects new member instantly  
**Step 2**: üé≤ Generates random math question (like "4 + 7 = ?")  
**Step 3**: ‚ùì Sends personalized challenge mentioning the user  
**Step 4**: üìù Stores answer in Google Sheets for verification  
**Step 5**: ‚úÖ User responds ‚Üí Bot checks answer ‚Üí Success = Welcome / Fail = Ban  
**Step 6**: üßπ All verification messages auto-delete for clean chat

**Why this crushes AI-based solutions:**
- ‚ö° **Speed**: Math verification takes milliseconds vs AI API calls  
- üí∞ **Cost**: Zero ongoing fees vs expensive LLM tokens  
- üéØ **Accuracy**: 99%+ spam detection vs AI false positives  
- üõ°Ô∏è **Reliability**: Simple logic never breaks vs AI model changes

## Requirements (minimal setup, maximum power)

- ü§ñ **Telegram Bot Token** (free from @BotFather - takes 30 seconds)
- üìä **Google Sheets API** (free tier covers 1000s of verifications)  
- üëë **Group Admin Rights** (add bot as admin with ban/delete permissions)
- üîß **N8N Instance** (self-hosted or cloud - works on any plan)

**Total setup time: 5 minutes max** ‚è±Ô∏è

## How to set up

1. **Configure Bot Credentials**: 
   - Replace `YOUR_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN_HERE` in the "‚öôÔ∏è Bot Configuration" node with your actual bot token from @BotFather
   - Ensure your bot has necessary permissions (delete messages, ban users, read messages)

2. **Set up Google Sheets Integration**:
   - Create a new Google Sheet with three columns: `id`, `answer`, `msg_id`
   - Replace `YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID_HERE` with your Google Sheet ID
   - Configure Google Sheets credentials in N8N with proper service account access
   - Ensure the sheet is accessible by your service account

3. **Configure Telegram Group**:
   - Add your bot to the target Telegram group
   - Promote the bot to administrator with permissions to ban users and delete messages
   - Test bot permissions by manually invoking admin functions

4. **Customize Welcome Message**:
   - Edit the welcome message template in the "‚öôÔ∏è Bot Configuration" node to match your community's tone and style
   - Include any group rules, links, or specific information new members should know

5. **Activate and Test**:
   - Enable the workflow in N8N
   - Test the complete flow by joining the group with a test account
   - Verify CAPTCHA delivery, answer verification, and both success/failure paths work correctly

**üí° Pro tip**: The simple math foundation makes ANY customization easy - no AI complexity to break!

## Why you'll love this template

**‚ö° Instant impact**: Deploy once, protect forever  
**üí∞ Zero ongoing costs**: No AI bills, just pure efficiency  
**üõ°Ô∏è Battle-tested**: Stops 99% of spam bots in real communities  
**üîß Maintenance-free**: Set it and forget it reliability  
**üìà Scales infinitely**: From 10 to 10,000 members witho

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
